department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: School Shuttle Services for the High Commission of Canada in Jamaica in Kingston
description: Global Affairs Canada (GAC) consist in a network of 178 Diplomatic and Consular Missions located in 112 Countries. The High Commission of Canada in Kingston in Jamaica requires school shuttle service for delivery and pick up of children of employee(s) of the Mission.",
full_summary:
### School Shuttle Services for the High Commission of Canada in Kingston, Jamaica

#### Announcement Number and Title

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01028779
* **Title (English)**: School Shuttle Services for the High Commission of Canada in Kingston
* **Title (French)**: Prestation de services de navettes scolaires pour le Haut-commissariat du Canada en Jamaïque, à Kingston

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Number**: 23-229073
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 17, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Industries Involved**: Transportation (GSIN V401B)

#### Contract Information

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 31, 2025
* **Contract Duration**: Approximately two (2) years

#### Contract Purpose

The High Commission of Canada in Kingston, Jamaica, is seeking a service provider to deliver and pick up school-going children of employees of the Mission. The successful service provider will be responsible for providing safe and reliable transportation services.

#### Eligibility Requirements

This tender is open to all qualified and experienced service providers. Prospective service providers are invited to submit their proposals, in accordance with the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP). For more information, please refer to the attached RFP documents.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions regarding this tender, please contact:
* Nataliiia Liu, International Policy Analyst
* Email: [internationalproposals@international.gc.ca](mailto:internationalproposals@international.gc.ca)
* Office: 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G2, Canada
* Phone: Not provided
* Fax: Not provided

#### Attachments

Please find the attached Request for Proposal (RFP) documents, which provide detailed information on the tender requirements and procedures.
